sn16.6:2.2: bhaṇḍañca → bhaṇḍuñca (bj) | abhijikañca → ābhiñjikañca (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr); ābhijjikañca (sya-all, km)
sn16.6:5.2: yathābāle yathāmūḷhe yathāakusale → yathā bāle yathā mūḷhe yathā akusale (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ (?)
sn16.6:6.3: taṃ vo mayaṃ → mayaṃ accayaṃ (bj, sya-all)
